# Test that signs are placed when opening a file that already has diagnostics.

vim ex 'e main.go'
vimexprwait errors.golden GOVIMTest_getqflist()
vim ex 'e other.go'
vimexprwait placed.golden 'GOVIMTest_sign_getplaced(\"other.go\", {\"group\": \"*\"})'
